about.aboutFront: Your Pet Can Be A Star in Petopus
about.aboutFront1: Bring any of your pets into this pet social media platform and let them socialize with their furrnds from the neighborhood.
about.aboutFront2: Petopus is a family friendly social network platform for pet lovers
about.Greatpet: A Happy Place for Pet Parents
about.Greatpet1: Build a satisfied community on Petopus pet social media to share infinite pet moments and happiness by making connections and maintaining a friendly relationship with all the pet parents in the app.
about.Greatpet2: At Petopus, pet lovers have a new way to stay connected and experience a secured and meaningful social networking experience. It is a platform where pets are the center stage
about.Friendlyandmore: Make Friends and Let Them Too
about.Friendlyandmore1: Experience the most satisfying and positive pet-centric social media network in Petopus where you can create meaningful connections with others and get services from trusted pet professionals.
about.Friendlyandmore2: It’s the soul of the social network.
about.Professionals1: Get immediate help and personalized suggestions in Petopus from qualified professionals who cares about animals so that your pets can be in a safe hand for any recommendation.
about.Secure1: Create a pet/ professional/ guest profile and share posts in Petopus with assured security and privacy so you can make your pets the center of attention by socially sharing their mutual love, and ridiculousness easily.

features.featuresfront: Bring Your Business To Petopus Pet Community
features.featuresfront1: Use the opportunities to promote your pet shop businesses and services in this great social network of passionate pet lovers.
features.Greatfeature1: Petopus is a user-friendly pet social networking platform that has been built with the latest technology so that your pets can find friends and professional help in need.
features.Greatfeature3: Create a group in Petopus and build a community of the same interest to share activities and funny moments.
features.Swipeprofile1: Set a maximum of 5 different pet profiles for 5 different pets and manage them altogether simply by swiping.
features.Discover2: Look for the social events and activities happening in your neighborhood and let your pets socialize.
features.Notificationalert1: Get lost and found color notification alerts without any sound or click-clank or buzz from the pet community.
features.Notificationalert5: I lost my cat joeda. She is new to the area. She has a microchio but no color.
features.Notificationalert6: Please check your garage and sheds in case she is there. You can find Joeda profile here

features.Localbusinesse1: Putopus empowers local businesses and gives opportunities to boost your success.
features.Localbusinesse3: Publish shoutouts for events, plans, and activities, or promote your local business to grow in the friendliest community and social network of pet lovers.
features.PetHealth4: Dogs have demonstrated they can learn and do complex things we have never..
features.PetHealth7: Publish articles about pets and related topics and share awareness among the pet parents in the community to create smart connections with the owners.
features.ReviewThatMatter1: Publish about your professional pet services and get 5-star reviews from your happy and satisfied clients and share their stories to expand your business relationship.
